text: Pot Noodle is a type of cup noodle sold in the United Kingdom. They contain noodles, soya pieces, vegetables, and seasoning powder with a packet of sauce that can be added to taste. == Available products == Pot noodles are available in several varieties: *Beef and Tomato *Bombay Bad Boy *Chicken and Mushroom *Chow Mein *Hot Chicken Curry *Seedy Sanchez (Mexican fajita flavour) *Southern Fried Chicken *Spicy Curry *Sticky Rib *Sweet and Sour *Sweet 'n' Spicy - formally "Nice 'n' Spicy" *The Sizzler (bacon flavour) *Mac nâ€™ Cheese *Chicken korma *Thai green curry Category:Noodles
title: Pot Noodle
